attributes.action: Get national lottery to reverse their decision not to fund UK animal charities
attributes.additional_details: Request foundations like the national lottery to fairly spread their funding to all charities
attributes.background:
The national Lottery help fund many UK based charities.

Up until recently this included Animal charities.

We need the Government to ask them to reverse this very preculiar decision.

Animal charities are the least funded in the UK and need help!

rejection.details: The National Lottery has not stopped funding animal charities.
